name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Accomplished Senior Platform Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, specializing in **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP** cloud services. Proficient in **Terraform** and **Ansible** for infrastructure as code, and skilled in orchestrating containerized applications using **Kubernetes**. Strong programming expertise in **Python** for backend development and automation tasks, facilitating seamless collaboration and team management.

Adept at developing AI/ML-powered platforms that enhance predictive analytics and real-time data processing capabilities. Proven track record of deploying microservices and event-driven architectures that improve application scalability and reliability.

Well-versed in compliance-driven development and ensuring alignment with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Leverage strong adaptability skills to thrive in dynamic environments, fostering effective team collaboration in high-stakes projects.

experience.responsibilities:
• Leveraged **AWS**, **Azure** and **GCP** to architect and deploy scalable cloud solutions, ensuring compliance with industry standards.
• Utilized **Terraform** and **Ansible** for infrastructure as code, automating deployment processes and enhancing operational efficiency.
• Designed and built full-stack platforms for healthcare and fintech using **Python** (FastAPI), TypeScript, and Node.js, ensuring full compliance with HIPAA, FHIR, GDPR, PCI DSS, and SOX.
• Delivered mobile applications for iOS and Android using Flutter and React Native, implementing native modules to facilitate secure user interactions.
• Created CI/CD pipelines tailored for mobile using **Fastlane** and **App Center**, incorporating test automation and release workflows.
• Led the transformation of legacy systems into microservices architectures, leveraging **Kubernetes** (AKS/EKS) and serverless functions via **AWS Lambda** and **Azure Functions** for scalable deployments.
• Built and maintained data infrastructure utilizing **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, Redis, and **GraphQL** to support heavy data ingestion for both health and finance domains.
• Deployed ML models for risk scoring and fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **PyTorch**, and **TensorFlow** with backend inference integrated into live systems.
• Implemented MLOps workflows using **MLflow**, **DVC**, and **Airflow**, managing model training and deployment pipelines across environments.
• Integrated intelligent features into frontend applications, such as personalized dashboards and financial summaries, powered by models hosted on **Azure ML** and **AWS Sagemaker**.
• Built **DevOps** pipelines using **GitHub Actions**, **CircleCI**, and **Azure DevOps**, ensuring full test automation and multi-environment deployment workflows.
• Developed advanced data visualization tools with **D3.js**, **Chart.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, enabling analysis of financial activity and operational KPIs.
• Collaborated closely with machine learning teams to deploy NLP models using **spaCy** and **Hugging Face Transformers**, exposed through secured REST APIs.
• Defined and enforced robust testing strategies across the stack using **Jest**, **Cypress**, **Postman**, and **PyTest** to ensure comprehensive test coverage.
• Integrated search capabilities with **Azure Cognitive Search** and **Elasticsearch**, supporting efficient querying across structured and unstructured datasets.

Leveraged **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP** to design and implement scalable cloud infrastructure solutions, ensuring high availability and performance of platform services.
Managed application configurations and deployments using **Terraform** and **Ansible**, streamlining the infrastructure as code (IaC) practices across development teams.
Implemented container orchestration with **Kubernetes** to support microservices architecture, enhancing application deployment efficiency and resource management across environments.
Modernized core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture using **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django), enhancing scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
Built interactive front-end applications with **React** (18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, utilizing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to create sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.
Delivered real-time analytics dashboards with **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies.
Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows such as payments, alerts, and compliance.
Developed ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time processing, scaling to handle **1 million** transactions per day.
Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns.
Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services, enhancing decision-making capabilities by up to **30%**.

Managed cloud infrastructure and services using **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, ensuring optimal performance and cost efficiency across development and production environments.
Architected and deployed Infrastructure as Code (IaC) using **Terraform** and **Ansible** for automated provisioning and configuration management, reducing deployment times by **30%**.
Led team collaboration efforts to enhance productivity and foster innovation while ensuring the alignment with business objectives and technical standards.
Designed and optimized backend services for a global e-commerce platform using **Python** (FastAPI, Django) and **Node.js** (NestJS, Express), ensuring high availability and scalable architecture across key modules like checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
Engineered real-time features using **WebSockets** and event-driven architecture powered by **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, achieving a **50%** reduction in order update latency.
Developed frontend applications using **React** (18), **Vue 3**, and **Angular**, enhanced with **TypeScript**, **Redux Toolkit**, and **Tailwind CSS**, delivering fast, responsive user experiences on both web and mobile platforms.
Leveraged **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra** for distributed data storage, ensuring fast, fault-tolerant data access for high-traffic e-commerce workflows and caching frequently accessed resources for performance gains.
Integrated AI/ML-based recommendation engines using **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow** to personalize product listings, optimize search relevance, and improve conversion rates based on real-time behavioral data.
Implemented **Redis** caching for product metadata, shopping cart sessions, and search results, significantly improving application responsiveness and reducing read pressure on databases.
Implemented feature flags and blue-green deployments using **LaunchDarkly** and **Kubernetes** namespaces, enabling controlled rollouts, A/B testing, and risk mitigation during major platform updates.
Created responsive, SEO-friendly e-commerce UIs using **Next.js**, **Vue 3 + Nuxt**, and **HTML5/CSS3**, optimized for mobile-first engagement and ensuring accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1).
Built secure payment workflows integrated with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, applying tokenized transactions and PCI-compliant handling of sensitive data.
Applied role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** for secure customer and admin access, ensuring **GDPR** compliance and user data protection throughout the platform.
